Var.Name: SysModulesReady
Var.Descr: Modules connected to Sline bus (bit index)

Var.Name: SysTBootExTmMax

Var.Name: SysTSlowExTmMax
Var.Descr: System Slow task execution time max (uS)

Var.Name: SysTBackExTmMax

Var.Name: SysDateTime
Var.Descr: System current local date time [Epoch time]

Var.Name: SysUTCDateTime
Var.Descr: System current UTC date time [Epoch time]

VarI.Name: Select
VarI.Descr: eFALSE:Rx message selection, eTRUE:Tx space selection
